孩子们的插图，悬崖上一座古老灯塔的水彩污渍，墙壁上有疤痕，海浪猛烈地拍打着。皮克斯风格。儿童照明，扁平风格，可爱，健康，美丽

6

In a playful marshmallow costume, a baby walks the runway, the fluffy white outfit bouncing gently with each step. The stage lights add a soft glow, making the scene as sweet as the smiles from the blurred audience.

穿着俏皮的棉花糖服装，一个婴儿走在T台上，蓬松的白色服装每走一步都会轻轻弹跳。舞台灯光增添了柔和的光芒，使场景像模糊的观众的笑容一样甜美。

7

A majestic interior of St. Peter's Basilica, filled with a sense of sacred awe and profound mystery. The soaring vaulted ceilings, adorned with intricate gold and marble decorations, stretch upwards towards the heavens. The central altar is illuminated by a soft, ethereal light, casting long shadows on the ornate marble floors. The space is adorned with intricate frescoes and sculptures, each telling a story of faith and divine glory. The atmosphere is hushed and reverent, evoking a deep sense of spiritual awe. Inspired by the Baroque style and the works of Gian Lorenzo Bernini, rendered in a detailed digital painting with a focus on texture and lighting. Rich, warm colors with hints of gold and deep blues, evoking a sense of timelessness and divine presence.,

圣彼得大教堂雄伟的内部，充满了神圣的敬畏和深刻的神秘感。高耸的拱形天花板装饰着错综复杂的金色和大理石装饰，向上延伸到天空。中央祭坛被柔和、空灵的光线照亮，在华丽的大理石地板上投下长长的阴影。这个空间装饰着错综复杂的壁画和雕塑，每一幅都讲述着信仰和神圣荣耀的故事。气氛安静而虔诚，唤起一种深深的精神敬畏感。灵感来自巴洛克风格和Gian Lorenzo Bernini的作品，在一幅详细的数字绘画中呈现，重点是纹理和光线。丰富而温暖的色彩，略带金色和深蓝色，唤起一种永恒和神圣的存在感。，

8

Camping by the lake at dusk, the leaves of the maple trees gently sway in the breeze. A little cat plays at my feet while I hold a warm cup of tea, my heart filled with tranquility. This moment reminds me that the beauty of life often comes from nature's gifts. No matter how noisy the outside world may be, inner peace is the most precious treasure. I realize that instead of pursuing material wealth, it’s better to enjoy this simple happiness, allowing my soul to find true healing.

黄昏时分在湖边露营，枫叶在微风中轻轻摇曳。一只小猫在我脚边玩耍，我端着一杯热茶，心中充满了宁静。这一刻提醒我，生命的美丽往往来自大自然的恩赐。无论外界多么嘈杂，内心的平静都是最宝贵的财富。我意识到，与其追求物质财富，不如享受这种简单的幸福，让我的灵魂找到真正的治愈。

9

mystical illustration style with vibrant elements, a golden butterfly surrounded by stars and moons, mystical art, wide angle view, vibrant elements, intricate patterns, golden butterfly, stars, moons, glowing stars, intricate lines, vibrant highlights, mystical filter, soft golden ambient lighting, gold and black colors, balanced composition, butterfly and stars in foreground, starry background

充满活力的神秘插图风格，一只被星星和月亮环绕的金色蝴蝶，神秘艺术，广角视野，充满活力的元素，错综复杂的图案，金色蝴蝶，星星，月亮，发光的星星，错综复杂的线条，鲜艳的亮点，神秘的滤镜，柔和的金色环境照明，金色和黑色，平衡的构图，前景中的蝴蝶和星星，星空背景

10

two noble and wealthy birds perched quietly on the heavy branches. one bird wore a hat full of miao characteristics, and the silver jewelry on the hat was exquisite, shining in the sun with a unique light. the other bird wore a gorgeous diamond. the diamonds were dazzling and exuded a charming charm. they all had long rainbow tail feathers with attractive red and white tones. they were carefully decorated with intricate patterns and sparkling diamonds, as if they were the brightest stars in the sky. the branches were solid and heavy, and the surrounding leaves swayed gently in the wind. soft light was evenly scattered on them, making their feathers even more dazzling. photographic style, fixed focus lens, physical rendering, warm light, mysterious tones, from a side perspective, 32k, the whole picture creates a luxurious and mysterious atmosphere, making people feel as if they are in a dreamy fairy world.

两只高贵而富有的鸟静静地栖息在粗壮的树枝上。一只鸟戴着一顶充满苗族特色的帽子，帽子上的银首饰精致，在阳光下闪耀着独特的光芒。另一只鸟戴着一颗华丽的钻石。钻石耀眼夺目，散发着迷人的魅力。它们都有长长的彩虹尾羽，有着迷人的红白色调。它们被精心地装饰着复杂的图案和闪闪发光的钻石，仿佛它们是天空中最明亮的星星。树枝结实而沉重，周围的叶子在风中轻轻摇曳。柔和的光线均匀地洒在它们身上，使它们的羽毛更加耀眼。摄影风格、定焦镜头、物理渲染、暖光、神秘色调，从侧面看，32k，整张照片营造出奢华神秘的氛围，让人感觉仿佛置身于一个梦幻般的童话世界。

Feminine silhouette body, lori earley,minimalist, in the style of pointillist optical illusions, mixed media marvel, intensity, dark silver and amber, crayon art, i can't believe how beautiful this is, psychedelic patchwork

女性剪影身体，洛里·厄尔，极简主义者，点画主义视错觉风格，混合媒体奇迹，强度，深银色和琥珀色，蜡笔艺术，我不敢相信这是多么美丽，迷幻的拼凑

12

The image shows a woman wearing an Egyptian-style outfit, including a golden headdress, a golden necklace, and a white dress with golden accents. She is also wearing a golden belt with a blue sash. She is walking away from the viewer, and her face is not visible. She is walking in a sandy area, and there are two cheetahs on either side of her. The cheetahs are walking in the same direction as the woman. In the background, there is a large statue of a lion.

图片显示，一名女子穿着埃及风格的服装，包括金色头饰、金色项链和带有金色色调的白色连衣裙。她还系着一条带蓝色腰带的金色腰带。她正在远离观众，她的脸不可见。她正在沙地上散步，两边各有两只猎豹。猎豹正朝着女人的方向走。在背景中，有一尊巨大的狮子雕像。

13

create a hybrid creature of karl lagerfeld and a poodle dog, with an oversized head, highly expressive eyebrows, and a mischievous grin. The illustration should be in the style of Tiago Hoisel, using the medium of crayons, and portraying the celebrity engaging in their most iconic activity or pose. Pay attention to capturing the essence of their unique personality and quirks, while emphasizing exaggerated features such as their hair, fashion style, or accessories. The setting should be a plain background. Capture a sense of humor and lightheartedness in this caricature that showcases the celebrity in an amusing and memorable way.

创造一个由卡尔·拉格菲尔德和贵宾犬组成的混合生物，有一个超大的头、极具表现力的眉毛和淘气的笑容。插图应该采用蒂亚戈·霍伊塞尔的风格，使用蜡笔作为媒介，描绘名人从事其最具标志性的活动或姿势。注意捕捉他们独特个性和怪癖的精髓，同时强调他们的头发、时尚风格或配饰等夸张的特征。设置应该是纯背景。在这幅漫画中捕捉幽默感和轻松感，以有趣和难忘的方式展示名人。

cute human heart

可爱的人心

鹤的形象包括各种姿势，如飞行、着陆、翱翔、展开翅膀和直立

16

AI robot amidst vibrant foliage, gently placing seeds in a rich green forest, sunlight streaming down, soft shadows and reflections, lush vegetation all around, calm and serene atmosphere, ultra-realistic detail.

人工智能机器人在生机勃勃的树叶中，轻轻地将种子放在茂密的绿色森林中，阳光倾泻而下，柔和的阴影和反射，周围郁郁葱葱的植被，宁静祥和的氛围，超现实的细节。

17

A friendly, photorealistic white gorilla waving hello with a gentle smile, standing against a vibrant violet background. The gorilla’s fur is thick and soft, with intricate detail in each strand, and its expression is warm and inviting, adding a charming touch to its powerful presence. The background is a rich, solid violet, emphasizing the gorilla’s unique white coloring, with a playful, whimsical atmosphere that brings the scene to life."

一只友好的、逼真的白色大猩猩站在充满活力的紫色背景下，微笑着挥手问好。大猩猩的皮毛又厚又软，每条毛发都有错综复杂的细节，它的表情温暖而诱人，为它强大的存在增添了迷人的触感。背景是浓郁的紫罗兰色，强调了大猩猩独特的白色，带有俏皮、异想天开的氛围，使场景栩栩如生。"

18

A golden peacock perched on the top of Mount Laojun in China, with its long tail shining like gold and its vibrant yellow feathers. The background features rolling mountains with a distant view. The photo was captured by professional photographers using high-definition cameras. This image has exquisite details, presenting stunning colors. Full-body photos showcase the peacock's majestic wings, adding to its elegant demeanor.

一只金孔雀栖息在中国老君山顶，它的长尾像金子一样闪闪发光，羽毛是鲜艳的黄色。背景是绵延起伏的山脉，可以看到远处的景色。这张照片是由专业摄影师使用高清相机拍摄的。这张照片细节精致，呈现出令人惊叹的色彩。全身照片展示了孔雀雄伟的翅膀，增添了它的优雅风度。

卡通人物，一个遛狗的女孩，周围环绕着古怪的浮动元素，大胆的粉红色和蓝色渐变背景，涂鸦风格的细节，可爱的面部特征，复古游戏图标，城市幻想，霓虹灯发光滤镜，动画旋转图案，脉动色彩光环，浮动气泡效果，像素艺术元素，漫画书半色调，街头艺术风格照片，

20

The monkey's fur is covered with white cotton, and its face has red cheeks like human children. It stands on the bank of West Lake in Hangzhou, holding an oar in one hand and looking at the water surface in profile. The sunlight shines through the clouds onto its body, creating a soft light effect that highlights the color contrast between brown hair and pink skin. Its eyes sparkle as it looks into the distance, adding depth to the scene.

猴子的皮毛上覆盖着白色的棉花，它的脸像人类的孩子一样红着脸。它站在杭州西湖岸边，一只手拿着桨，看着水面的轮廓。阳光穿过云层照射到它的身体上，产生柔和的光线效果，突出了棕色头发和粉色皮肤之间的颜色对比。它望向远处，眼睛闪闪发光，为场景增添了深度。
writingDetail.title: 精选Prompts：纸老虎、文字肖像、火烈鸟、电影海报、灯塔、俏皮孩儿等
